How to use Rotating Proxies

IP rotation using rotating proxies library is implemented to take care of possible proxies use.

You can use you own proxies as follow:

  • add your proxies to proxy.py

  • enable the proxies using: through DOWNLOADER_MIDDLEWARES in diplomaticpulse.settings:

    DOWNLOADER_MIDDLEWARES = {
  'rotating_proxies.middlewares.RotatingProxyMiddleware': 610,
  'rotating_proxies.middlewares.BanDetectionMiddleware': 620
}
